text: Hey there, i’m having trouble with the mobile menu on the vast theme at 768px the mobile menu shows up fine but once it hits 767px the links disappear. Not sure what could be causing the issue, has anyone ran into this issue before with the mobile menu from vast?
that def sounds like a style issue.

That’s what I figured but what’s weird is I applied styles to the menu and it seems to take any of my styles prior to 768px but after it hits 767px it seems to ignore any styling I try to throw at it.
found the issue :face_palm: someone set an opacity: 0 on the class lol
does anyone know if it’s possible to add custom icons into my theme for use in the `icon` field type?
The icon field is just fontawesome
drats, ok. any suggestions for how I can allow my users to manage the SVG icons on their site and use them within modules?
even just being able to upload an svg in the `image` field would be great, but that’s seemingly not possible
I seem to be able to use the `file` type, but not sure if that’s recommended
Use a partial and extend a block with a variable pulled from a. Text field in the module
Haha.. I know that was clear as mudd
Look up partials and extends in the docs
You can extend a block by also passing a variable.

so I want to clarify this a bit. how does this help me? I can include the partial of another HTML file, but how do I deal with getting user-generated SVGs globally available and then let my users pick the one they want to display in a specific area?
Advanced Menu Module -> Breadcrumb Style. Why do menu items that are 'no link' appear as links in the breadcrumb? Does anyone know a workaround for this? It's very confusing for the user.
